page.title: 10A Farm in Monmouth
page.content: { Court Farm, Wonastow}has 183 acres. 8 acres of woodland, 83 acres grass let for grazing, 23 acres of winter barley, 10 acres of hay, 35 acres of silage. The{stock:}85 beef cattle, 25 weaned calves, 2 horses.{Machinery:}3 tractors, baler, plough, trailer, fertilizer spinner, muckspreader,2 mowers, discs, harrows, turner, 2 rollers, sprayer, sledge, mole drainer, loader, pick-up truck. {Contractors}do baling, silaging, combine harvesting and hedge trimming.{Calves}are bought in{local {markets}and sold as{store cattle between November and February.The day begins at 7.30 am{feeding}the stock.Autumnal work consists of ploughing, working down, and planting the winter barley.The farmer does contract ploughing for other farmers in the area.
